overview: Gathering together some of Echelon Studios' greatest short films, this compilation serves up a unique blend of snack-size cinematic treats in one convenient collection. Featuring the shorts "Late Bloomer," "The Paul Decca Story," "One-Track Mind," "Execution at County Jail," "Gas Station" and "On the Cliffs," this assemblage of quick-flick fixes is sure to entertain and inspire fans of the fast-paced format.
title: The Short Stack: Volume 1
